title: Equipment Reservation | Language and Culture Learning Center | University of Illinois at Chicago

Language and Culture Learning Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Language and Culture Learning Center      Language and Culture Learning Center   Main Menu    About           What We Do    Who We Are    Affiliate Language Centers         Peer Tutoring           What is Peer Tutoring?    Meet Our Tutors    Tutoring Schedule (ONLINE as of 3/16)    For Students (Tips and Resources)    Become a Tutor    Peer Tutoring Blog    Tutoring FAQ    Contact Peer Tutoring         Events           Schedule of Events    Conversation Hours    Film Series    Special Events         Language StorieS    For Instructors           Professional Development    Instructor Resources    COVID-19 Resources         Contact           General Inquiries    Equipment Reservation    Oasis Reservation          Eyebrow menu    lcsl.uic.edu    las.uic.edu    +Give    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Language and Culture Learning Center    Contact    Equipment Reservation        Equipment Reservation  To reserve equipment for your class, event, or a project, please fill out the form below. Please note that we do not rent equipment to students.  You can also send us an email .      equipment   Name * Required    First     Last   Your Role at UIC: * Required Please note that we do not rent equipment to non-teaching students. Your Department/ Program * Required On what day would you like to pick up the equipment? - must be mm/dd/yyyy format * Required   Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY   What time would you like to pick up the equipment? * Required Please note that the time is just an estimate for us to make sure that someone will be in the office and the equipment is ready for you. If there are any adjustments necessary, we will contact you with details.    :  HH     MM    AM/PM  AM  PM    When do you plan to return the equipment? - must be mm/dd/yyyy format * Required   Date Format: MM slash DD slash YYYY   Select the equipment you would like to check out: * Required   Canon Vixia camcorder with a tripod and memory cards    Photo camera (Nikon, large)    Photo camera (Sony, small, automatic)    Headset (with a USB), 1-100 (indicate the number in comments)    OLYMPUS DS-40 field recorder    iPod Classic MP3 player    Lenovo laptops – Windows 10 laptop with basic software (web browsers, Microsoft Office, VLC media player)    Lenovo Yoga 2-in-1 laptop – these laptops have both laptop and tablet functionalities; great for design work    Asus Android tablet    Apple iPad    adapter for Macbooks, HDMI, etc. to connect to UIC podia    LG portable DVD drive    speakers (wired)    VGA, HDMI, audio, and other assorted cables    wireless mouse    regular (wired) mouse    kayboard    other (describe below)  Other/ additional comments * Required Please tell us any details about the equipment you need or indicate what you are looking for if not listed above.              This iframe contains the logic required to handle Ajax powered Gravity Forms.          Contact           General Inquiries    Equipment Reservation    Oasis Reservation             Peer Tutoring Contact Information  Click here if you have questions about our Peer Tutoring in French, German, Spanish, or Italian.      General Inquiries to LCLC  If you have a general inquiry to LCLC or are not sure which category it fits, send us an email here.      Reserve the Language Oasis  If you would like to schedule a special event in our Language Oasis please click here and let us know how we can help.      School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics  The School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics (LCSL) is home to six independent departments, three academic programs, and the Sandi Port Errant Language and Culture Learning Center.
